extensionDescription.message: LinkedIn Container isola vòstra activitat LinkedIn de la rèsta de vòstra activitat web per dire d’empachar LinkedIn de vos pistar defòra del site LinkedIn via de cookies tèrces.
extensionDescription.description: Description of the extension. DO NOT TRANSLATE "LinkedIn Container".

in-fbc-subhead.description: This is shown at the top of the panel pop-up when the user is on a LinkedIn website, which has been automatically opened into LinkedIn Container. DO NOT TRANSLATE "LinkedIn Container".

in-fbc-p1.message: Ara LinkedIn pòt vos pistar sus aqueste site. Per suprimir aqueste site de LinkedIn Container, seleccionatz « Sites autorizats » dins LinkedIn Container e tiratz-lo de la lista.

on-facebook-subhead.message: Sus LinkedIn e suls sites isolats per LinkedIn Container
on-facebook-subhead.description: This is shown at the top of the panel pop-up when the user is on a LinkedIn website, which has been automatically opened into LinkedIn Container. DO NOT TRANSLATE "LinkedIn Container".

on-facebook-p1.message: Aquesta icòna apareis a la barra d’adreça de Firefox quand consultatz de sites que son gerits per LinkedIn o de sites qu’ajustèretz a LinkedIn Container.
on-facebook-p1.description: This is shown in the body of the panel pop-up when the user is on a LinkedIn website, which has been automatically opened into LinkedIn Container. DO NOT TRANSLATE "LinkedIn Container".

on-facebook-p2.message: Aqueste sites an d’accedir a vòstra identitat LinkedIn (o saber qui sètz) per foncionar. Aquò significa tanben que LinkedIn pòt pistar tot çò que fasètz sus aquestes sites.
on-facebook-p2.description: This is shown in the body of the panel pop up when the user is on LinkedIn.

notOnLinkedInHeader.message: $URL$ se tròba pas dins LinkedIn Container.
notOnLinkedInHeader.description: This is shown at the top of the panel pop-up when the user is NOT on a LinkedIn website, which has been automatically opened OUTSIDE LinkedIn Container. DO NOT TRANSLATE "LinkedIn Container".

notOnLinkedInText.message: Aqueste site es pas dins LinkedIn container. Fa venir mai complicat a LinkedIn de vos pistar pel web.
notOnLinkedInText.description: This is shown in the body of the panel pop-up when the user is NOT on a LinkedIn website, which has been automatically opened OUTSIDE LinkedIn Container. DO NOT TRANSLATE "LinkedIn Container".

onUnknownSiteHeader.message: Aqueste site es pas dins LinkedIn Container.
onUnknownSiteHeader.description: This is shown at the top of the panel pop-up when the user is on an "unknown" website - e.g., about:newtab. DO NOT TRANSLATE "LinkedIn Container".

facebookContainer.description: This is the name of the extension, and appears at the top of all onboarding panels. Please do not translate "LinkedIn Container".

onboarding1-subhead.description: This is the subhead of onboarding panel 1. Please do not translate "LinkedIn Container"

onboarding1-p1.message: LinkedIn pòt pistar vòstra navegacion en delai de LinkedIn.com. Per exemple los botons « M’agrada » e « Partejar » pòdon pistar ont sètz anat — amai sus las paginas qu’avètz pas aimadas o partejadas.
onboarding1-p1.description: This is the first paragraph of onboarding panel 1. Please do not translate "LinkedIn Container"

onboarding1-p2.message: LinkedIn Container estrema los sites LinkedIn de la rèsta del web, es doncas mai complicat per LinkedIn de vos pistar en linha.

onboarding2-subhead.message: Sus LinkedIn e suls sites isolats per LinkedIn Container
onboarding2-subhead.description: This is the subhead for the second onboarding panel. Please do not translate "LinkedIn Container"

onboarding2-alt.message: L’icòna de barrièra de LinkedIn Container
onboarding2-alt.description: This is alternative text for the icon in the second onboarding panel

onboarding2-p1.message: Aquesta icòna apareis a la barra d’adreça quand consultatz de sites, coma LinkedIn.com, que son dubèrts dins un contenidor LinkedIn Container.
onboarding2-p1.description: This is the first paragraph of the second onboarding panel.

onboarding2-p2.message: Aqueste sites an d’accedir a vòstra identitat LinkedIn (o saber qui sètz) per foncionar. Aquò significa tanben que LinkedIn pòt pistar tot çò que fasètz sus aquestes sites.
onboarding2-p2.description: This is the second paragraph of the second onboarding panel. Please do not translate "LinkedIn Container"

onboarding4-subhead.description: This is the subhead for the fourth onboarding panel.

onboarding4-p1.message: Encara que siatz pas sus LinkedIn, LinkedIn pòt vos pistar en linha. Los botons que vos permeton de publicar de causas sus LinkedIn o vos connectar al site via vòstre compte LinkedIn contenon de traçadors. LinkedIn Container blocarà aqueles traçadors e mostrarà una icòna de barrièra per vos far veire que de traçadors son estats tirats.
onboarding4-p1.description: This is the first paragraph of the fourth onboarding panel.

onboarding4-img.message: Aqueste imatge mòstra cossí l’icòna de la barrièra de LinkedIn Container apareis al costat del boton « M’agrada » de LinkedIn.
onboarding4-img.description: This is alternative text for the image shown in the fourth onboarding panel.

onboarding5-subhead.message: Se connectar via LinkedIn sus d’autres sites
onboarding5-subhead.description: This is the subhead for the fifth onboarding panel.

onboarding5-p1.message: Per utilizar la connexion amb LinkedIn sus d’autres sites, vos caldrà los declarar coma autorizats. Clicatz l’icòna de la barrièra e seleccionatz « Autorizar lo site dins LinkedIn Container » enbàs.
onboarding5-p1.description: This is the first paragraph of the fifth onboarding panel.

onboarding5-img.message: Aqueste imatge mòstra cossí lo boton per apondre un site a LinkedIn Container apareisserà pel panèl.
onboarding5-img.description: This is alternative text for the image shown in the fifth onboarding panel.

onboarding5-p2.message: Aquò vos permet de vos connectar via LinkedIn mas permet a LinkedIn de vos pistar sus aqueste site.
onboarding5-p2.description: This is the second paragraph on the fifth onboarding panel.

btn-allow.description: This is a button to allows users to whitelist the domain, adding it to the LinkedIn container.

btn-cancel.description: This is a button to cancel out of the onboarding panel.

btn-next.description: This is a button to continue to the next onboarding panel.

btn-back.description: This is a button that returns the user to the previous onboarding panel.

btn-done.description: This is a button the user clicks to close out the panel when they have finished reading the text.

btn-arrow-back.description: This is alternative text for the back arrow button.

btn-arrow-forward.message: Anar a Cossí LinkedIn Container fonciona
btn-arrow-forward.description: This is alternative text for the arrow icon next to the "How LinkedIn Container Works" link

no-trackers-subhead.message: Cap de traçador de LinkedIn pas detectat

no-trackers-p1.message: LinkedIn Container a pas detectat cap de traçador de LinkedIn sus aquesta pagina. Pasmens, aquesta pagina pòt conténer d’autres tipes de traçadors.

learn-more.description: This is a link that opens a page with more information about LinkedIn Container.

how-fbc-works.description: This is a button that opens the LinkedIn Container onboarding flow.

trackers-detected-subhead.description: This is a subhead, and it means that the add on has protected the user by blocking LinkedIn trackers.

trackers-detected-p1.message: Los botons LinkedIn apareisson suls sites de crompa, d’actualitat e d’autres encara que contenon de traçadors qu’indican a LinkedIn çò que consultatz. Amai s’utilizatz pas jamai aquestes botons per aimar o partejar, los traçadors pòdon reculhir de donadas de vòstra navegacion. LinkedIn Container bloca aqueste traçadors.

trackers-detected-p2.message: LinkedIn Container bloca aqueles traçadors. Pasmens, se clicatz qual que siá d’aqueles botons LinkedIn poirà vos pistar.

trackers-detected-fence-alt.message: Barrièra de LinkedIn Container amb un escut.
trackers-detected-fence-alt.description: This is alternative text describing the container fence icon.

sites-included.description: This is a header for the list of websites that are in the LinkedIn Container by default. Capitalized letters are preferred if that makes sense/is feasible for the language.

no-sites-added.description: This message is shown beneath the 'SITES YOU’VE ALLOWED' list header when no sites have been added to the contaner.

sites-allowed.description: This is the header for the list of sites the user has manually added into the LinkedIn Container. Capitalized letters are preferred if that makes sense/is feasible for the lanaguage.

sites-added-p1.message: LinkedIn container isola los sites qu'apertenon a LinkedIn. Podètz apondre d’autres sites al contenidor, aquò permetrà a LinkedIn de pistar vòstra navegacion encara mai.

button-allow-site.message: Autorizar lo site dins LinkedIn Container
button-allow-site.description: Button text that allows sites to be added to the LinkedIn Container

button-remove-site.message: Suprimir lo site de LinkedIn Container
button-remove-site.description: Button text that removes an already-added site from the LinkedIn Container to the default container

button-remove-site-tooltip.message: Coma aqueste site es proprietat de LinkedIn, pòt pas èsser tirat de LinkedIn Container.
button-remove-site-tooltip.description: Tooltip that is displayed when hovering over the remove site button

remove-site-subhead.message: Volètz suprimir lo site de LinkedIn Container ?

remove-site-p1.message: Se tiratz aqueste site de LinkedIn Container, la foncion de connexion amb LinkedIn foncionarà pas mai e los cookies de seguiment seràn suprimits.

remove-site-p2.message: Se volètz tornar utilizar la foncion de connexion amb LinkedIn, auretz de tornar apondre aqueste site a LinkedIn Container.

add-site-subhead.message: Volètz permetre a LinkedIn de vos pistar sus aqueste site ?

add-site-p1.message: Aquò vos permet de vos connectar via LinkedIn, mas permet a LinkedIn de vos pistar sus aqueste site.

inPageUI-tooltip-button-share.message: LinkedIn Container a desactivat aqueste boton e a empachat LinkedIn de pistar vòstra visita sus aquesta pagina.

inPageUI-tooltip-button-login.message: LinkedIn Container a blocat de traçadors LinkedIn. Se vos connectatz amb LinkedIn sus aqueste site, poirà vos pistar.

inPageUI-tooltip-prompt-p1.message: Volètz permetre a LinkedIn de vos pistar aquí ?

inPageUI-tooltip-prompt-p2.message: Se volètz utilizar la foncion de connexion amb LinkedIn, alara LinkedIn poirà pistar vòstra activitat sus aqueste site. Aquò pòt lor ajudar a construire un perfil mai complèt de vòstra vida en linha.

inPageUI-tooltip-button-share-passive.message: Se clicatz aqueste boton, LinkedIn poirà vos pistar sus aqueste site.

inPageUI-tooltip-button-email.message: S’utilizatz vòstra adreça electronica reala aquí, LinkedIn pòt vos pistar. Clicatz aquí per ne saber mai.

inPageUI-tooltip-email-prompt-p1.message: Autorizar LinkedIn a vos pistar aquí ?

inPageUI-tooltip-email-prompt-p2.message: Aqueste site pòt partejar vòstra adreça electronica amb LinkedIn, çò que lor permeton de vos pistar. Utilizatz un servici coma Firefox Relay per amagar vòstra adreça electronica.
